name: OTP_RX_DOSEHX_CMNT
description:
This table extracts the related multiple response item Ingredient Dose Change Comment.





The related tables are:


OTP_RX_DOSEHX_TYPE


OTP_RX_DOSEHX_DTTM


OTP_RX_DOSEHX_USER


OTP_RX_DOSEHX_DOSE


OTP_RX_DOSEHX_UNIT


OTP_RX_DOSEHX_RSN


OTP_RX_DOSEHX_CMNT


OTP_RX_DOSEHX_PCT

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order template record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: IN_DOSE_CHG_CMT
columns.description: The user-entered comment for the dose modification on this value line.
